mapper.insert: insert into EQUIPMENTINTEGRITY (MPSNO, PROCESSNO, FSTARTTIME, PRECOVERYTIME, FENDTIME, FDESCRIPTION, STATUS) values (#{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fstarttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{precoverytime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fendtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fdescription,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select MPSNO, PROCESSNO, FSTARTTIME, PRECOVERYTIME, FENDTIME, FDESCRIPTION, STATUS from EQUIPMENTINTEGRITY

select p.mpsno,p.processno,fstarttime,precoverytime, fendtime,fdescription,e.status from EquipmentIntegrity e,Process p where e.MPSNo=p.MPSNo and e.ProcessNo=p.SequenceNo
and rtrim(e.mpsno) like concat(concat('%',#{mpsno}),'%')
and rtrim(p.processno) like concat(concat('%',#{processno}),'%')
